column1: All our food is prepared in-house by our dedicated team of chefs and kitchen staff.
Please inform our reservations team concerning your catering requirements. We will endeavour to meet all dietary requirements. We require two weeks notice for all catering services.
These prices are valid until March 31st 2008. The prices may be altered at any time, without prior notice. However, no alteration will be made to a confirmed booking.
All prices are subject to VAT at the current rate.

column9: class=main_text">For a comprehensive list of our terms and conditions please refer to RML Terms and Conditions.
